author: Shane Brinkman-Davis Delamore, Imikimi LLC
description: atomic data-types such as Color, Point, Rectangle and Matrix
name: art-atomic

scripts.build:
cd source
find . -name '*.js' -o -name '*.css' | cpio -vpdm ../build
cd ..
coffee -m --output build --compile source &
COFFEE_PID=$!
caf -m -c source -o build --require coffee-script/register&
CAF_PID=$!
wait $COFFEE_PID || exit 1
wait $CAF_PID || exit 1
npm run nn
scripts.build-clean:
# BUILD CLEAN START
#   - building into: build-temp
#
rm -rf ./__build-old__
cd source
find . -name '*.js' -o -name '*.css' | cpio -vpdm ../build-temp
cd ..
coffee -m --output build-temp --compile source &
COFFEE_PID=$!
caf -m -c source -o build-temp --require coffee-script/register&
CAF_PID=$!
wait $COFFEE_PID || exit 1
wait $CAF_PID || exit 1
npm run nn

nn build-temp/*

# BUILD CLEAN FINIALIZING
#  - replace old build in:   build
#  - with new build from:    build-temp
#
mv build __build-old__
mv build-temp build
rm -rf ./__build-old__
